price: 他从天上降下有定量的雨水，借雨水而使已死的地方复活。你们将来要这样从坟墓中被取出。
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَنشَرۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī nazzala mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-ansharnā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika tukh'rajūna
